description: The Archibald Knox Forum plans to bring together up to 200 pieces of the Art Nouveau designer's work.
title: 'Biggest ever' Archibald Knox exhibition planned on Isle of Man
title_page: 'Biggest ever' Archibald Knox exhibition planned on Isle of Man - BBC News
maintext: Mr Hobdell said: "I want people to see what about the history and culture and landscape of the Isle of Man, what effect it had on him, and how it inspired him to do the wonderful works he did because all his work is bound up in Manx and Celtic history and tradition."
